title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
SR: The Steps to Reproduce:1. Create a new project.2. Create a new report.3. In the Data Explorer view, add a new Data Source to connect to a derby database using the following settings:Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2DriverDatabase URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/guiUser Name:rootPassword:root4. After setting up the Data Source, create a new dataset.5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.6. <missing information>
